title: tool Hyper-V manager to manage easly Hyper-v VMS
body:
Hello everyone,
after a bigg effort I propose my tool HV-MAN (free), it is a tool that I developed for microsoft, which makes it possible to manage the VMS in a very easy way, it makes possible to change network switch in a few clicks, and also toggle between viewing virtual machines, as well as lists, it connects directly to the virtual machine and you dont need to configure the RDP mode, it also allows to manage a remote server if you are in domain.
the link is as follows: https://inforti.wixsite.com/site/hv-man
for downloads : https://www.dropbox.com/s/o1alhrhcvuxyl3d/HV-MAN-v2.0.msi?dl=0
